author: Team BitBunny.io
title: BitBunny.io: Adopt animals w/ NFT
description: NFTs are not being used to their fullest potential-- As a means to represent tangible real-world assets in the blockchain.
solution: Bitbuny.io will offer a fun proof-of-concept way to experiment with new representation of blockchain assets with the goal of adding value.
experience: 10+ years as a web designer and graphic designer. 8 years experience with farm life and rabbit husbandry. A degree in communication studies.
